scripts.client:deploy:dev: rm -rf build && yarn build:dev && cd build && echo '{}' > composer.json && echo '<?php include_once("home.html"); ?>' > index.php && mv index.html home.html && git init && git add . && git commit -m 'Initial commit' && git remote add client-feed-list-dev https://git.heroku.com/client-feed-list-dev.git && git push --force client-feed-list-dev master
scripts.client:deploy:prod: rm -rf build && yarn build:prod && cd build && echo '{}' > composer.json && echo '<?php include_once("home.html"); ?>' > index.php && mv index.html home.html && git init && git add . && git commit -m 'Initial commit' && git remote add client-feed-list-prod https://git.heroku.com/client-feed-list-prod.git && git push --force client-feed-list-prod master
scripts.server:deploy:dev: yarn server:predeploy:dev && git subtree push --prefix server heroku-dev master
scripts.server:deploy:prod: yarn server:predeploy:prod && git subtree push --prefix server heroku-prod master
